Uses of Interface
uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.fullscreen.FullScreenStrategy

  • Packages that use FullScreenStrategy 
    Package Description
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.component
    Provides higher-level components used to create basic media players with the minimum of application code.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded
    Provides the classes necessary to support the embedding of native media player video output in Swing/AWT user interface components.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.fullscreen.adaptive
    Full-screen strategy implementation that picks the best available depending on the run-time operating system.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.fullscreen.exclusivemode
    Full-screen strategy that uses the standard JDK approach.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.fullscreen.libvlc
    Native full-screen strategy that uses LibVLC.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.fullscreen.osx
    Native full-screen strategy for OSX.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.fullscreen.unsupported
    A do-nothing full-screen strategy implementation to explicitly and completely disable full-screen support.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.fullscreen.windows
    Native full-screen strategy for Windows.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.fullscreen.x
    Native full-screen strategy for the X Window System.

      Classes in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.fullscreen.adaptive that implement FullScreenStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AdaptiveFullScreenStrategy
      Implementation of an full-screen strategy based on the current run-time operating system.

    • Uses of FullScreenStrategy in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.fullscreen.exclusivemode

      Classes in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.fullscreen.exclusivemode that implement FullScreenStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ExclusiveModeFullScreenStrategy
      Default implementation of a full-screen strategy that attempts to use the JDK full-screen exclusive mode support.

    • Uses of FullScreenStrategy in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.fullscreen.libvlc

      Classes in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.fullscreen.libvlc that implement FullScreenStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LibVlcNativeFullScreenStrategy
      Implementation of a FullScreenStrategy that uses the native LibVLC fullscreen API.

    • Uses of FullScreenStrategy in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.fullscreen.osx

      Classes in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.fullscreen.osx that implement FullScreenStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OsxFullScreenStrategy
      Implementation of a full-screen strategy that uses the Apple EAWT classes to implement native full-screen.

    • Uses of FullScreenStrategy in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.fullscreen.unsupported

      Classes in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.fullscreen.unsupported that implement FullScreenStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  UnsupportedFullScreenStrategy
      Simple do-nothing implementation of a full-screen strategy.

    • Uses of FullScreenStrategy in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.fullscreen.windows

      Implementation of a full screen strategy that uses the native Win32 API.

    • Uses of FullScreenStrategy in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.fullscreen.x

      Classes in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.fullscreen.x that implement FullScreenStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  XFullScreenStrategy
      Implementation of a full-screen strategy that uses the native X11 window manager.
